content: Drag performer **Azizul "Izzy" Mahathir** (born June 8, 1989), best known by the [stage name](/wiki/Stage_name) **Vanda Miss Joaquim**, is a Singaporean [drag](/wiki/Drag_(clothing)) performer who competed on the [second season](/wiki/Drag_Race_Thailand_(season_2)) of *[Drag Race Thailand](/wiki/Drag_Race_Thailand)*. She is the first Malay Muslim who represented [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) on the show. She has been described as one of Singapore's most famous drag queens. She operates the House of Miss Joaquim. In 2019, she was a panelist on "All Around the World: International Drag Queens" at [RuPaul's DragCon NYC](/wiki/RuPaul%27s_DragCon_NYC). ## Filmography ### Television - *[Drag Race Thailand](/wiki/Drag_Race_Thailand)* ([season 2](/wiki/Drag_Race_Thailand_(season_2))) ### Content - The Rise of Vanda Miss Joaquim This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Vanda Miss Joaquim (drag queen)
